title: international transactions
extract: An international transaction is a money transfer (often as part of a business deal) that crosses national borders, frequently involves two different currencies, and can even involve three currencies if a reserve currency, such as the US dollar is used.
extract_html: An international transaction is a money transfer (often as part of a business deal) that crosses national borders, frequently involves two different currencies, and can even involve three currencies if a reserve currency, such as the US dollar is used.
